textBox.richText: Finally I'm allowed to share with you a session from my conference!! Every session here at WWDC has a strict proviso that anything mentioned during the presentation is confidential. Since i cannot share anything with you let me just say that there are some really cool things in the pipeline (that is Apple’s standard comment when asked about future technology)!! Last night they held a session that I am allowed to share with you folks out there. Is called Stump the Experts. Being a nerd i found it extremely entertaining!! Its a simple game show type session where the nerds in the audience get to ask quiz questions to a selection of engineer. These guys and gals are the smartest in the industry. Some pretty big names appeared on stage. Ok ... no one that a normal person would know!! At lunch today they had a session that was led by an software engineer at a certain animation studio that I absolutely love (if you know me you know who I’m talking about). I know I’m not meant to talk about it so i won’t, but i have to say that this session was absolutely fantastic as we were taken on a behind the scenes look at what Apple technology does to aid in the compilation of these amazing movies!! I’ve already checked and unfortunately they don’t have any open positions!! :)
